title: 银鱼最速科普
author: asc9966
txt_content:
本帖最后由 asc9966 于 2011-9-8 07:13 编辑 

http://tieba.baidu.com/p/1203456273
Silverfish:
蠹（dù）鱼:
The Silverfish is a new mob that is planned for Beta 1.8. Its 
texture can currently be found in the Beta 1.7.3 minecraft.jar. 
Silverfish will very rarely pop out of blocks that are mined by the 
player, and start to attack them.[1]

蠹鱼是一种在1.8升级中新加入的生物，它的皮肤纹理可以在1.7.3版的minecraft.jar里找到。

据说它会在玩家挖矿时以非常低的概率从被破坏的石头中生成，并且攻击玩家。

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 那个不是鱼吧 是一种吃木头的虫子

replies.author: geludan
replies.txt_content: 攻击玩家。。。还是该把notch打一顿，第三次了。。。

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
這不是"銀魚"... 而是"蠹蟲"... 

WIKI上頭也有提到... 牠不是"魚"... 
Jeb confirmed that the silverfish won't be a water mob, ruling out the possibility of the Silverfish being an actual fish.

replies.author: green丶bastard
replies.txt_content: 其实看图片就知道了 哪里都不想鱼
